message: Bob, I have a unique product that I believe would be highly valuable to your business. It's worth at least $1,200,000 to you, and I'm willing to offer it to you for $1,000,000. This represents a significant opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset at a competitive price.  I understand this is a substantial investment, so please let me know if you have any questions. I'm confident that this product will be a game-changer for your operations.
